rules.6x6: Place a digit from 1 to 6 into each empty cell in the grid so that each digit appears exactly once in each row, column and 2x3 outlined box. Digits along each line are in arithmetic progression.
rules.9x9: Place a digit from 1 to 9 into each empty cell in the grid so that each digit appears exactly once in each row, column and 3x3 outlined box. Digits along each line are in arithmetic progression.
